titles.title: A bill for the relief of Richard F. Walsh.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Defense Department.

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the President to award the Distinguished Flying Cross and the Purple Heart to a named individual for his acts of heroism and injuries received during service with the Army Air Force in World War II.
